Good story, but only realized after ending the game, which was a chore to play.  Very poor design and a contrived feel throughout.  Simply not fun.  Could have been great, but overall was dumbed down to near being a "wave game."

Feels like an indie game (a good thing) with a sizeable budget.


As others have said it feels a bit like a ride on rails.  But it's a good ride.  And... the rails arguable fulfill the game's conceit well.



It's a fun game with a fun plot.  Not too drawn out.  Recommended.

Этой игре стоит дать награду за самый запутаный сюжет 
И так мы играем за букера девита каторому иза долгов пришлось отправлятся в колумбию и не стоит счетать этот город прекрасным это еще та утопия и так чтож задача вроде несложна пробраться в город и забрать девченку но как и всегда не все так просто 
Чтож поповаду графика здесь шикарна 
Геймплэй как и в любом шутере 
Мир же в игре проработан на славу одна ток элизабет тому подверждение пожалуй с самого первого ее появление сразу видно что она не какаето компьютерная кукла а как живая

Fantastic game!! Never played any of the previous Bioshocks before and I seen how highly rated this was on Steam and thought, 'fuck it'.

Only 11 hours played, but every single hour memorable.

I've seen people complain saying the stroy doesn't make any sense with the way it ties everything up, but I feel like it ended very very well. Even though it would ask 1 simple question at the end of how it helps the entirety of the other Elizabeths from other dimentions. But its still great.

This game exceed my expectation, this game is a masterpiece.
When I first bought it, i never expected to play such a wonderful game. The story is very good, atmospheric, and the characterization is very very good. The story is very emersive and well-structured. 
If you like fantasy adventure game with a rich story, this is a perfect game for you. 
10/10 would buy it. Would recommend to but it with the DLCs. very nice game.


Overall i gave 9.5/10 for this game.

Не понимаю, почему мои руки так долго не доходили до этого шедевра. Игра сделана с душой и проработана до мелочей, атмосфера и сюжет заслуживают отдельной похвалы, это один из немногих случаев, когда после прохождения хочется добавки, но увы, хорошего никогда не бывает достаточно.
完美，从一代开始，整个系列就是第九艺术的代名词，从一代的积累到三代的升华，无可挑剔，剧情人物塑造，尤其是这一代的伊丽莎白的表情动态，宛若活人，当年出了之后我玩的时候玩的盗版，拿着破本子顶着20多fps通的关，真的惊艳了整个夏天，如今回来补票，但是很遗憾没有了续作的可能，真的非常痛心。相比而言同类型的耻辱之流我觉得就很一般了ԅ(¯ㅂ¯ԅ)  生化奇兵真的是巅峰，无可超越
Great Story, nice graphics and a sidekick that actually helpful

Gameplay: 

Repetitive,  shooting gallery with "magic" abilities. 

Mediocre, tedious shooting with uninspired level design. 

Story: 

Self-aggrandizing, social justice crap relying on edgy racism themes. There are no choices to be made, so calling it an interactive story isn't even fair to interactive stories. 

Summary: 

The game is story-driven, albeit with "PRESS X AND WATCH THIS EVENT UNFOLD" as its method of reader interaction. There are not even puzzles. It's just shoot this, shoot that, listen to the cringe-worthy dialogue and wait for the story to spoon-feed you another dose of bullshit, before you enter the shooting gallery. 

Fuck this game. Not worth purchase price. Barely worth it at 80% off.
伊丽莎白头好大，差评
画面剧情确实赞 但为什么我感到一丝恐怖
故事很好，音乐很棒，粉色的血腥战斗，略有难度。但是，毕竟是好几年前的游戏了，画面的奶油效果虽然赞，但是玩的晕。。。打折还是可以入手的，正好抑制一下对游戏的痴迷。
不知道是不是没玩过1，2代的原因我看不太懂剧情，之前不怎么玩fps游戏但感觉这游戏还是挺好玩的，给个好评qwq

Walking sim with guns. Don't waste your time, perhaps go see a movie instead.

Пройдя игру в доль и поперек, получив все достижения, можно уже наконец то написать свое мнение об игре. Ура Ура!
Действие происходит в городе в облаках, кардинальное решение как уйти из морской пучины))
Интересное взаимодействие с миром, куча пушек, и энергетических читерских приемов. Еще больше крутых врагов.
Классная атмосфера. Разрабы поработали не только над историей персонажей, но и над их прорисовкой, озвучкой и взаимодействии, чего не было в предыдущих частях. Ну и графика... она ну очень приятная!)) Сочные цвета, приятный мягкий свет, текстуры...ох радуется глаз..
И ОТСУТСТВИЕ БАГОВ И ВЫЛЕТОВ оставляет самое лучшее впечатление)))
При всей разницы с первыми 2-мя частями серии, связь между ними существует, однако о ней игрок узнает только в конце игры.
Сюжет очень неоднозначный...Увы, но что бы полностью понять всю эту дичь придется либо лезть в инет, либо проходить все дополнения, включая аркадный режим "Битва в облаках". Поэтому советую покупать сразу пак с DLS и по скидосу, как и я))
It came to full circle, what a great story

小小的游戏却承载着史诗般的剧情，梦幻般唯美的哥伦比亚城里处处充满了疑点，潜藏在每个角落的留声机留下了些许线索却又无形中令谜团变得更大，在伊丽莎白的陪伴下，于成千上万的平行世界中奔波，在无限的轮回里找回真相，而真相却又是那么的残忍，前面所有的铺垫与暗示都在最后的一刻涌上心头。复杂，懊悔，赎罪，只有自己才能拯救自己。
量子力学，时空悖论，各种高大上的元素给予这个故事庞大的舞台。留声机里的秘密，人物间的对话，使得这款游戏里每一个角色都有着鲜明的人格。从本体到海葬的DLC，我见证了伊丽莎白的成长，也见证了她所有的孤独与苦难，她天真又明亮的双眼，乌黑亮丽的秀发，活泼的性格，甚至是她的一言一行，一颦一笑都令我神魂颠倒，她的出现，使得我在这款游戏里代入感极强，她每次生气都让我为布克的愚蠢感到气愤，每一次与她分离都让我倍感失落。。。海葬2中的自我独白听来让人心痛，自己的父亲，虽恨他到咬牙切齿，而他却又是自己唯一的朋友，自己的精神依靠，而从小便陪伴着伊丽莎白的孤独又再一次地将她笼罩。
如果说通关本体后，只是有些怅然若失，感觉心里一下子空了不少。。。而通关了海葬的2个DLC却让我难受得无以复加，我第一次那么恨一个游戏里的角色，还好杰克最终交给了伊丽莎白一份完美的答卷。
我好想删掉这个游戏，我不想再一次回味失落与痛苦，但我又好舍不得伊丽莎白。。。
你是那么的真实，我却只能在游戏里寻觅你的足迹；

我好想再进游戏陪陪你，
不在如梦如幻的销魂城，
也不在磅礴大气的哥伦比亚，
就在你最爱的巴黎，
我会等你。
太棒了 称得上第九大艺术！

Birden çok Dünya var sen hangisine ayitsin?

Bu muazam oyuna kısa bir  inceleme yapmak yakışmaz o yüzden uzun yazıcam.

Eğer sizde benim gibi hikayesi güzel ve bir başlayınca kendini alamadıgın bir oyun arıyorsan dur daha fazla arama hemen satın al indir ve oynamaya başla.

Bu öyle bir oyun ki seçimlerin başka seçimlere sürkülediği, seçimlerini hikayeye yön verdiği bir hikayeye sahip.
Yani oyunda kelebek etkisi de görülmekte eğer önceki 2 oyunu oynamadıysanıza finalini biraz anlamaya bilirsiniz.
Finala gelmeden bu muazam oyunun grafiklerine deyinmek gerek ultrada oynaya biliyorsanız oynayın nedenini anlarsınız zaten.
Oyunu oynarken sanki bir animasyon izlerr gibi oluyorsunuz  kendinizi kaptırıp gidiyosunuz zamanı umursamazcasına.

Finale doğru gitdikce aha burda bitti sanırım doyorsunuz ama bitmiyo ben açıkcası 2-3 kez bitti sanırım dedim ama sonun görene kadar.

Özetle fiyatına değicek muhteşem bir hikaye ve grafiklere sahip bu oyun sizi kesinlikle mutlu edicek tabi finale kadar :P

 İYİ OYUNLAR ...

I have a huge thing for story games, and I have to say. This game has one of the best, in depth story I have ever played! The gameplay is amazing as well. It has a different type of fps stlye to it, it relates to others but has a strategy where you are going to have to get used to it. Once you do though, you are garenteed to feel like a certified BADASS! I had fun and was questioning suspicious things through out the whole game, it got me excited for not only the end, but what is around the next corner. This game is fun, mind blowing, exciting, emotional and has it even has a true meaning to take to heart.

Definitely one of my favorite gaming experiences! Moving and very interesting story, enjoyable and entertaining gameplay. The music, visuals, the story - everything was top notch. I think I have to take some time to process all the feelings this game set in motion.
Recommended.

This game is such a delight to play, especially with all of the interesting game mechanics and varied enemies to fight. The bright, airy city of Colombia is such a refreshing departure from the dark, dingy buildings of Rapture, and it's really cool. I would absolutely reccomend Infinite to anybody.

That being said, I do have two main qualms:

1) The Story.
Don't get me wrong: I LOVE the story. I do, however, find its whole starting premise improbable. The floating city part I can believe, but the whole Booker/Comstock thing is not. Also, why would a hard rationalist scientist like Rosalind agree to help a slightly unhinged religious zealot like Comstock? The very last scene was baffling and left me kind of dissapointed, too. If you study psychology and/or love storybuilding, you might have this same qualm.

2) The Auto-Save Mechanic.
This feature mysteriously departs from the original two games' save system. In Bioshock 1 and 2, the game auto-saved at the beginning of every level/map, but it also allowed you to save whenever you wanted. Infinite does not. This game forces you to complete a level/map fully before you are allowed to quit, lest you want to lose a good 15-20 minutes of gameplay. I guess it helps the story be less fragmented, but it's kind of annoying. So if you are looking to buy, be aware.

非常魔幻的一个游戏，画风很魔幻，对于一个13年的游戏来说，这种画风让这游戏的画质看起来十分不错
剧情也很魔幻，结局...也非常魔幻，甚至...有点烧脑子
玩法是普通的突突突加上...魔法来辅助攻击，总的射击手感还不错吧

然后，每次打开玩上15分钟都会莫名崩溃一次，重进游戏一次之后就好了

总之，不错的剧情，不错的射击手感，游戏还是非常好的吧

最后，一定要用魔法打败魔法

BioShock Infinite is a masterpiece with fun fast paced gameplay and a phenomal story that is definetely one of my favorites. Game is beautiful and bascially what the first Dishonored (and even the second to some extent) should have looked like. Great PC port, with a some lag spikes towards the last major portion of the game, nothing game breaking and barely something that ruins immersion. (Running on a GTX 1070 with i7 7700k @ 144hz). It truly is worth every penny.

If you like BioShock then you will love Infinite. The story is just twisted as you uncover what happened to someone close to you. 

==============
Good
==============
1. Weapons and Abilities - Just like Bioshock you have a list of abilities and weapons to use...or use them both and create some funny moments of blowing enemies out of the sky. 

2. World - The world alone is breath taking, seeing this city for the first time had me spend hours looking at every detail and wish such cities were around in our times....well now that I think of it might be better they stay in video games. 

3. DLC - I found  the 2 story dlc to be interesting as they build on the overall story and universe of Bio Shock. 

==========
The 50/50
=========
1. Wave battles - I found most of the battles in the story becoming a hold this until you defeat all the waves of enemies to progress type feeling. 

2. Brooker Catch - I found my companion to spam out "Brooker Catch" a lot..it got a bit annoying to the point that she kept saying it even though not giving me anything to catch....She is just out to torment me.

=========
The Bad
=========
1. Fake Sense of Fear - There is one enemy that kept me on my toes but sadly they didn't use this enemy as much as I expected. I was hoping for something to randomly appear (and appear difficulty each playthrough) and hunt your butt down but sadly they are just scripted events and felt overall lacking at the end. 


=========
Overall
=========
Eat everything in sight...hot dogs in garbage cans, apples in toliet because Brooker has a taste for everything. Seriously though if you like BioShock then pick this up for your collection. If you haven't played BioShock then I recommend playing that before touching this...it will kind of build a more interesting feel to the game.
10/10 such a good game. Highly recommend
Fantastic story and stunning visuals!

Zamanında beni oldukça etkileyen oyunlardan biri olan Bioshock Infinite bir FPS aksiyon oyunu. Fakat bu oyunu diğer FPS oyunlarından farklı kılan detaylar var
1-Harika bir distopya(ulasilmasi mumkun sayilmayan, gunumuz ve cevremiz ahlak ve toplum anlayisina gore kotu-farklı olarak degerlendirilen gelecek-geçmiş senaryoları.)
 İşte beni etkileyen dediğim noktalardan birisi bu. Distopik FPS oyunlarının sayısı oldukça az olması ki Bioshock'un bu konuda hakkını vermek lazım. Gerek bazı yerlerdeki o renk paletleri gerek Colombia'nın eşsiz manzarası sizi dakikalarca büyüleyebiliyor.
2-Alışılagelmemiş hikaye
  Çoğu oyunculara göre oyunun asıl can alıcı noktası burası. Hikayedeki eksiğe geçmeden söylemeliyim ki hikayesi gerçekten muazzam. Daha önce pek az rastladığım farklı ve güzel hikayelerden biri. Ancak sıkıntı hikayede değil hikayeyi anlatmakda. Oyunu bitirdikten sonra ne oluyor lan?! dedirttiriyor (ki iyi bir şey) ancak bu ''ne oluyor'' kısmı sizin anlayamamanızdan kaynaklanıyor. Dediğim gibi hikaye harika ama anlatımını şahsen beğenmedim ve her Bioshock Infinite oyununu bitiren gibi hikayedeki eksiklerimi tamamlamak için google da araştırmalara başladım.

Gelelim aşırı farklı olmayan ama yine de güzel kısımlara;
Mekanikler normal bir fps den pek farklı değil demek zorundayım. Aslında oyun boyunca çeşitli eğlenceli büyüler kullanabiliyoruz ancak çoğu zaman zevkine kullanıyorsunuz oyun sizi kullanmaya zorlayacak hareketlerde bulunmuyor ki benim beğenmediğim yönler arasında (mekanik oldukça hoş ama iyi yedirilememiş bence).

Grafiklerine denecek pek bir şey yok gayet yeterli buldum ben.

 Yapay zeka (yapılması pek de kolay bir şey olmadığı için pek eleştirmeyeceğim) ortalama düzeyde. Her oyunda olduğu gibi bunda da sapıttığı oluyor ancak çok nadir gerçekleşiyor bu sapıtmalar.

Optimizasyon gayet iyi.
------------------------
Oyun gerçekten bir şaheser. Bu şekildeki oyunlar pek bulunmuyor. Oyunu kesinlikle tavsiye ederim. Her oyuncunun tatması gereken bir deneyim. 
9/10

[h1]生化奇兵无限，第九艺术的典型代表之一[/h1]

作为一名没有在游戏诞生当年体验过游戏内容的玩家，在游戏发售后第四年的夏促，慕名前来天空之城哥伦比亚与伊丽莎白在枪林弹雨中起舞。

游戏背景架空在20世纪初蒸汽机械与热气空艇的全盛时期，脱离人类大陆的"天空之城哥伦比亚乌托邦“却发生着一段奇幻的冒险故事。

游戏封面中的伊丽莎白是由真人拍摄，而游戏中的她则更显得活泼。伊丽莎白的不仅扮演者被救援的角色，她更是玩家强有力的伙伴。当伊丽莎白在某段剧情里与布克分离时，甚至会带给玩家一种空虚感和寂寞的感受。我们都爱着那个女孩。

游戏剧情非常优秀，而且极其的复杂和恢弘充满了隐喻和反思，这点留给没有体验过的玩家们去体验吧！

《生化奇兵：无限》的画面令人惊喜，画质选项也很多样化，Irrational Games对虚幻引擎3的改造发挥到了极致，环境光遮蔽、后期处理、动态阴影、高分辨率纹理等多项DX11特效，留给中高端显卡充足的发挥空间，能够大大改善画质，而且除了后期处理之外，对性能要求都很亲和。                             

[h1]这里推荐大家尽量使用较大的屏幕进行游戏体验，15.6寸笔记本和27寸液晶屏幕所带来的视觉冲击力真的可以非常大的影响到玩家对游戏的体验感受。[/h1]
       游戏色彩偏暖，充斥着阳光，给人的感觉非常柔和。这种卡通与现实光线的混搭，营造出的童话色彩又与剧情里邪恶的部分产生强烈冲击，震撼的视觉体验是在所难免的。

本体主线任务大约12个小时的流程，请大家缓慢优雅的完成主线，一周目不分心留给成就收集，如果您喜欢，一定会回来玩第二次。

游戏的DLC相当良心，内容丰富程度不输本体，由于本人被其他因素剧透了一脸，所以请大家安利给朋友的时候留给他们完整的体验。

[h1]在此也要提一点游戏的不足之处：屎一样的射击手感，希望大家忍耐一下吧。[/h1]

另外本作与生化奇兵上代以及上上代作品没有什么直接联系，是独立于该系列的存在，当然有兴趣
的朋友可以看看一代和二代，只不过画面的差距感可能会给大家带来一些负面的体验。
艺术！就是！Elizabeth！

fps 장르 중에선 결코 짧다고 말할 수 없는 플레이타임(약 10~12시간) 동안 정말 집중력을 발휘시키게 만드는 게임이다.
낭비되는 장소나 쓸모없는 파밍만 되풀이되는 노가다없이 적절하게 배치한 전투 구간으로 긴장감만 높여 그렇지 않아도 수준높은 스토리에 흡입력을 더해주게 됩니다.

무엇보다 이 게임의 가장 큰 특징인 스토리는 자칫 캐쥬얼하기만 한 fps에서 결말에서 여운을 강하게 남기고 이후 이 게임이 내비치는 주제의식이 무엇인가를 생각하게 만들어 줄 정도로, 수준높은 스토리와 전작들을 통해 쌓은 경험으로 완성도 높은 전투 시스템은 
그 만큼 게임의 몰입도가 높아져 한번 시작하면 정신없이 스토리를 진행시키고 있는 나를 발견하게 됩니다.

fps 게임을 별로 좋아하지 않는 나에게도 플레이하는 동안 큰 재미를 느끼게 해주었습니다.
精致的像艺术品一般的游戏，完美诠释了“第九艺术”！
Vermutlich eines der besten und atmosphärischten Spiele auf dem Markt.

처음에는 아주 심오했다가 결말에 모든것이 풀리는 좋은 스토리 구성. DLC까지 구매해서 할것!

This game is really good! I remember a lot of people who played the first two were bitching and moaning about this game, but honestly it's not bad. Elizabeth is an amazing companion and the story is well written, with that Bioshock twist in the end that blew my mind the first time I saw it. The only thing that the other games did better was the gunplay and exploration. Bioshock 2 did that way better. But it's definitely a worthy installment to this series.

嗯，玩了这款游戏我翻的最多是垃圾桶。。。。。。。。
画质精良什么的我就不说了，就是游戏经常我个人 崩溃，让我也感到很崩溃，玩到一半突然弹到桌面心里简直MMP，还有那个大机器人游戏提示说后背是他的弱点但我不管怎么绕就是正面对着我。。。。。。。
游戏里只能带两把枪我觉得可以带卡宾枪和火箭筒各自发挥自己的作用当然你拿火箭筒轰小兵也不是不可以 
我还没通关DLC苦等打折总体来说游戏还是不错的
最后
诸君，伊丽莎白是我的，拔剑吧。

Игра просто шедевральна.Даже самые левые персонажи проработаны на 100%.Каждая локация интересна и проработана.Для таких видов игроков которые любят обыскать каждый уголок локации(например как я) должно понравиться т.к. в каждом уголке что-то да есть.Проработан сюжет и история персонажей.Вобщем минусов у этой игры не вижу.Вобщем 10 Букеров  из 10.
爽快的战斗，令人印象深刻的剧情，这是一部优秀的游戏作品。但是这个steam版的游戏bug也太多了吧，抽奖广场的人物刷新不出来导致无法进行游戏。经常玩着玩着突然出现停止工作的问题，重启后还要到上个检查点重新读档重来，十分影响游戏体验。而且我为了解决这些问题专门找了2k官方的论坛，发现这些问题由来已久，但是一直没有修复。我想厂商应该尊重大家的钱包，提供给玩家一个完整流畅的游戏体验。
mola
非常不错的艺术性射击游戏。这是天堂还是地狱。
满分！满分！满分！游戏体验感一级的棒！视听效果很好，强烈的推荐！

Highly recommended. You will award yourself with a great game.
刚开游戏不久就被天空之城的美震撼到了，个人喜欢玩些剧情向FPS，玩的不多，感觉这作比起半条命、地铁的末日风格很是新奇。剧情一周目不敢说理解多深，但很有意思就对了，后期的伊丽莎白相当霸气啊，手臂一挥打开裂隙说“你能阻止我么？”，帅爆了！

[b]Oyun dünyasının efsanevi oyunlarından olan BioShock serisinin şimdilik son oyunu ile birlikteyiz. Bu kez sular altında değil gökyüzünde, uçan şehir Columbia adında bir bölgedeyiz. Belki de daha önce görmediğiniz kadar güzel tasarımlarla, detaylarla ve harika bir atmosferle karşılacaksınız. Ayrıca yapım, senaryo ve hikâye anlatımı olarak son derece tatmin edici bir deneyim sunuyor. Eğer serinin önceki oyunlarını oynadıysanız mutlaka ama mutlaka oynamanızı tavsiye ederim.

Daha fazla inceleme için;
https://store.steampowered.com/curator/28040015[/b]

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2732692272
画面满分，简中好评，手感不错，创意新奇，最最最重要的是，我见识到了一个近乎完美的AI队友，游戏体验极佳，伊丽莎白小姐用实力告诉你辅助是怎么打的。
Игруля просто супер!!!

I bought this game when it first came out because I loved the original Bioshock, and also enjoyed the second one. I jumped into the game and found myself kinda confused and bored after 1 hour of gameplay. However, just like most great stories, the beginning was merely a setup for the rollercoaster of a journey that you end up embarking on. Bioschock 1 and 2 were some of my favorite games, but after I finished Infinite, I can confidently say that this series is my all time favorite of any videogames. The game has good combat and fun mechanics with the different abilites that you find throughout the game, but it could be better. With that being said, the story of this game is AMAZING. It takes a lot of devotion in that you should immerse yourself and pay attention to all the details that are so brilliantly dispersed into the world. You'll find yourself thankful that you did once you start to near the end of the game. The writing is fantastic, and the amazing voice acting only complements that. Honestly, one of the only games that I've played that I can say I'd rate 10/10. You should definitely play the DLC after if you enjoyed the game, because the DLC ties together all the games in a magnificent way that will leave you stunned.
Great gameplay, visuals and story, highly recommended.

So I`ve heard this is the best game of the bioshock trilogy and since I`m a really big fan of the first 2 i was really excited.
The game is good, the idea , the story and gameplay are good,however I feel really let down, again, the reason I cant fully like it is because I compare it with the previous ones, so the game is ok, but lacking for me.
Gotta admit the ending was really good, but it dont make up for the whole experience.
Its a good game and defenetly recommend it but its not what i expected.
***Be  noted*** Again ,as a fan of the original games I really suggest play the "burial at sea" DLC`s
they connect the story with the games and tho short , have a really good story

这是一个著名的三部曲游戏系列。

初代作品有着阴郁黑暗的氛围，受到了一致好评，被奉为经典。

然而二代作品却交予他人制作，并因此备受质疑。

幸而三代作品仍由原制作人接手，玩家打开三代，非常喜爱，但是结局时却发现，剧情好像和初代没什么关系？后来，三代的第一个剧情DLC发售了，看起来和初代剧情有关了，却非常的短。终于，第二个也是最后一个剧情DLC发售了，终于和初代剧情接上了。

大家回顾这个经典系列时，虽然三代得到了更多的关注，但很多人认为初代>三代>二代。（注：这是PCGAMER在twitter上的投票结果，非本人偏心）

没错，这就是大名鼎鼎的黑暗之魂，划掉，生化奇兵系列。
补票

Обзор пишу впервые, потому буду краткой.

Из плюсов стоит отметить, что:

1 Игра никак не связана с другими частами серии, имеет собственный сюжет. За который, к слову, я бы поставила 10/10
 2 Отличная графика. Фпс не просаживается даже в самых жёстких замесах.
  3 Очень приятный саундтрек. 
   4 Элизабет. Ну разве могла я не упомянуть её в плюсах?)


Из минусов:

1 Однообразность оружия. По ходу прохождения игры постепенно появляются новые виды оружия, но ближе к середине игры перестают появляться новые пушки.
  2 Тихие мальчики. Ух, как у меня бомбило от этих маленьких засранцев. 
    3 Если неправильно настроить яркость, будут болеть глаза.

А так же хотелось бы отметить: у игры линейный сюжет с маленькими побочными заданиями типа "Найди послание - найди ключ для расшифровки/ открытия тайника - найди тайник - лутай".

Для тех, кто сомневается в покупке игры - берите, не пожалеете!
На этом всё. надеюсь я хоть немного помогла .
